Beads description:
Basic panel/drawer container component. Minimal 'empty' style - a slide-in panel structure without specific content. Provides the base container styling that can hold any content. Should support multiple origin directions via modifier classes (.left, .right, .top, .bottom). Should support light/dark themes and integrate with Graffiti's existing .di-drawer styles. Reference: Tailwind UI 'Empty' drawer pattern.
